ISSUE.TITLE: drone 0.4 docker image can't use /etc/hosts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: There is no `/etc/nsswitch.conf` in the image so I extended it and added one and it started working: ``` # /etc/nsswitch.conf # # Example configuration of GNU Name Service Switch functionality. # If you have the `glibc-doc-reference' and `info' packages installed, try: # `info libc "Name Service Switch"' for information about this file. passwd: compat group: compat shadow: compat hosts: files dns networks: files protocols: db files services: db files ethers: db files rpc: db files netgroup: nis ```
